message: Let's make a deal Bob.  I take $60, you take $40. It's in our best interest to settle this now.
I think we can do better than your initial offer. Considering the inflation, this is a more reasonable split.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. Let's split the difference - I'll take $55, you take $45.  Each round is costing us both money!
We're both losing value each round, but you're losing more. I think this split reflects that.
Bob, this is ridiculous. We're both losing money hand over fist. Let's split it 50/50 and call it a day.
